org.xbib.marc

Class Marc.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xbib.marc.Marc.Builder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MarcListener, MarcRecordListener, MarcXchangeConstants
    Enclosing class:
    Marc

    public static class Marc.Builder
extends java.lang.Object
implements MarcXchangeConstants, MarcListener, MarcRecordListener
    A builder for MARC field streams, MARC records, and XML.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface org.xbib.marc.MarcXchangeConstants
